powder-mark-trail.name: Powder Mark Trail
powder-mark-trail.description: Emblazoned with a gunpowder mark that will cause you and the nearest ally to explode when this effect expires
powder-mark-trail.explanation: Both players are hit by large AoE tankbusters. The explosions will go off immediately if the bearer dies

prey.name: Prey
prey.explanation: You are tethered and will be hit by a mechanic from the tethered boss/clone.

fated-burn-mark.name: Fated Burn Mark
fated-burn-mark.description: Emblazoned with a fateful burn mark that will cause you to explode with a vengeance when you are KO'd.
fated-burn-mark.explanation: If you die before the debuff falls off, it's a heavy raidwide with a Damage Down, but not an automatic wipe.

floating-fetters.name: Floating Fetters
floating-fetters.description: Bound in midair and unable to move.

mark-of-mortality.name: Mark of Mortaility
mark-of-mortality.description: Branded with a mark of mortality. Damage dealt is reduced. Too many stacks will result in KO.
mark-of-mortality.explanation: This is a 90% damage down, which stacks with regular Damage Down to produce a 99% damage down. Two or more stacks are instantly lethal.

bleeding.name: Bleeding
bleeding.explanation: This is a very strong bleed from the raidwide.

bleeding-2.name: Bleeding
bleeding-2.explanation: This is a massive dot as a penalty for standing in a Sinbound Holy puddle. It is so strong that it typically one-shots. Technically, it is two separate debuffs. The first one has indefinite duration, but when it ticks it replaces itself with a 30-second version.

thin-ice.name: Thin Ice
thin-ice.description: Having trouble maintaining a solid foothold upon ice-covered ground.
thin-ice.explanation: You will slide quite a long distance in whatever direction you try to move. Almost the entire width of the arena.

lightsteeped.name: Lightsteeped
lightsteeped.description: Overflowing with astral energy. Upon accumulating 5 stacks, you will deal unaspected damage to those nearby.
lightsteeped.explanation: At 5 stacks, explodes in a raidwide that inflicts an additional stack on everyone. The ensuing chain reaction will almost invariably wipe the party.

chains-of-everlasting-light.name: Chains of Everlasting Light
chains-of-everlasting-light.description: Bound with chains of everlasting light. Will be subject to a Curse of Everlasting Light when this effect expires.
chains-of-everlasting-light.explanation: You are tethered to two other players, but have no restrictions yet.

curse-of-everlasting-light.name: Curse of Everlasting Light
curse-of-everlasting-light.description: Cursed by everlasting light. Close proximity to the player to whom you are bound will result in unaspected damage to those nearby.
curse-of-everlasting-light.explanation: You are tethered to two other players.

the-weight-of-light.name: The Weight of Light
the-weight-of-light.description: Will unleash Powerful Light when this effect expires.
the-weight-of-light.explanation: A gold orb appears above your head. Powerful Light is light party stack AoE that inflicts one stack of Lightsteeped on anyone hit.

deep-freeze.name: Deep Freeze
deep-freeze.description: Your body is encased in ice, preventing action and dealing damage over time.
deep-freeze.explanation: Unable to move or take actions

invincibility.name: Invincibility
invincibility.explanation: The Ice Veil is immune to all damage while any crystals are tethered to it.

vulnerability-down.name: Vulnerability Down
vulnerability-down.explanation: The crystals receive this buff if they are hit by one of the cleaves. The Ice Veil recives it in place of Invincibility if all the light crystals are killed and all dark crystals are left alive.

siw-dark-fire.name: Spell-in-Waiting: Dark Fire III
siw-dark-fire.description: Designated target of Dark Fire III, which will activate when this effect expires.
siw-dark-fire.explanation: Dark Fire III is a large circle AoE.

siw-dark-blizzard.name: Spell-in-Waiting: Dark Blizzard III
siw-dark-blizzard.description: Designated target of Dark Blizzard III, which will activate when this effect expires.
siw-dark-blizzard.explanation: Dark Blizzard III is a donut AoE.

siw-unholy-darkness.name: Spell-in-Waiting: Unholy Darkness
siw-unholy-darkness.description: Designated target of Unholy Darkness, which will activate when this effect expires.
siw-unholy-darkness.explanation: Unholy Darkness is a large party stack. Will inflict Mark of Mortality if not soaked by 5+ players.

siw-return.name: Spell-in-Waiting: Return
siw-return.description: Designated target of Return, which will activate when this effect expires.
siw-return.explanation: When this expires, your position will be snapshotted and a blue marker appears to indicate where it was snapshot. When the Return buff expires, you will be returned to the snapshotted position.

siw-shadoweye.name: Spell-in-Waiting: Shadoweye
siw-shadoweye.description: Designated target of Shadoweye, which will activate when this effect expires.
siw-shadoweye.explanation: Shadoweye will inflict Doom, which is guaranteed death, on any player who isn't looking away.

siw-dark-water.name: Spell-in-Waiting: Dark Water III
siw-dark-water.description: Designated target of Dark Water III, which will activate when this effect expires.
siw-dark-water.explanation: Dark Water III is a light party stack AoE. Will inflict a stack of Mark of Mortality if not soaked by 4+ players.

siw-dark-eruption.name: Spell-in-Waiting: Dark Eruption
siw-dark-eruption.description: Designated target of Dark Eruption, which will activate when this effect expires.
siw-dark-eruption.explanation: Dark Eruption is a circle AoE.

return.name: Return
return.description: Aetherially entwined with the temporal manifold. You will be stunned and drawn back to your aetherial trace when this effect expires.
return.explanation: When this expires, you will be returned to the snapshotted position and stunned for a few seconds.

siw-refrain.name: Spell-in-Waiting: Refrain
siw-refrain.description: The next spell cast will activate in stages after a delay.
siw-refrain.explanation: This buff is purely an indicator that the Oracle's Dark Water III during Apocalypse will be broken into stages. There's no other effect.

lightsteeped-3.name: Lightsteeped
lightsteeped-3.description: Overflowing with astral energy. Upon accumulating 5 stacks, you will deal unaspected damage to those nearby.
lightsteeped-3.explanation: At 5 stacks, explodes in a raidwide that inflicts an additional stack on everyone. The ensuing chain reaction will almost invariably wipe the party.

refulgent-chain.name: Refulgent Chain
refulgent-chain.description: Bound with chains of light. Your Refulgent Fate will be sealed when this effect expires.
refulgent-chain.explanation: You are tethered to two other players, but have no restrictions yet.

refulgent-fate.name: Refulgent Fate
refulgent-fate.description: Cursed by binding light. If the distance between you and the player to whom you are bound becomes too great or too small, you will deal unaspected damage to those nearby.
refulgent-fate.explanation: You are tethered to two other players. You must stay at roughly the distance between the two towers.

lights-design.name: Light's Design
lights-design.description: Subject to the Oracle of Light's design. Damage taken from certain targets is increased.
lights-design.explanation: Damage from the Oracle of Darkness is lethal.

darknesss-design.name: Darkness's Design
darknesss-design.description: Subject to the Oracle of Darkness's design. Damage taken from certain targets is increased.
darknesss-design.explanation: Damage from the Usurper of Frost is lethal.

siw-dark-aero.name: Spell-in-Waiting: Dark Aero III
siw-dark-aero.description: Designated target of Dark Aero III, which will activate when this effect expires.
siw-dark-aero.explanation: Dark Aero III is a large circle AoE. Any other player hit by the AoE is knocked back a long way.

siw-quietus.name: Spell-in-Waiting: Quietus
siw-quietus.description: Designated target of Quietus, which will activate when this effect expires.
siw-quietus.explanation: Quietus is a raidwide with no additional effects.

wyrmclaw.name: Wyrmclaw
wyrmclaw.description: Shredded by draconic talons. KO will occur when countdown reaches 0.
wyrmclaw.explanation: Must be cleansed by touching a dragon head. This will cause an AoE and leave a blue puddle on the ground.

wyrmfang.name: Wyrmfang
wyrmfang.description: Torn by draconic teeth. KO will occur when countdown reaches 0.
wyrmfang.explanation: Must be cleansed by touching a blue puddle left behind by someone cleansing Wyrmclaw.

down-for-the-count.name: Down for the Count
down-for-the-count.description: Unable to move or execute actions.
down-for-the-count.explanation: Given during the transition to phase 5.
